channel.title: Comments for page "Fortune Teller"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Fortune Teller"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I got a Great Ryo fortune, same general pattern as Nytemaren above.
+1k-5k ryo daily until the next festival, check your daily news starting tomorrow

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Got a new different festival result:

ortune Teller

You pull out a stick, and after shouting "THE FUTURE IS REVEALED", Rover looks at the markings on it, and hands you your fortune.

You unroll it to reveal…
a Pretty Good Stamina Fortune. Not bad!

(+10-50 Stamina daily until the next Festival,
check your Daily News starting tomorrow!)
